metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5093 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The get_icu_value_internal function in ext/intl/locale/locale_methods.c inPHP before 5.5.36, 5.6.x before 5.6.22, and 7.x before 7.0.7 does notensure the presence of a '\0' character, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via a crafted locale_get_primary_language call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.8-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.8-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
php7.0 - 7.0.8-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

criterions.comment: php7.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.8-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
